meanings.definition: Capable of being made or created.
meanings.sent1: The toy blocks are makeable, so you can build anything you want.
meanings.sent2: The makeable clay can be molded into different shapes.
meanings.sent3: The makeable ingredients in the recipe magically turned into a delicious cake.
meanings.sent4: Her makeable imagination painted vivid pictures in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The makeable fabric allowed for endless possibilities in designing clothes.

meanings.definition: Able to be produced or manufactured.
meanings.sent1: The makeable parts of the machine were assembled by the workers.
meanings.sent2: The makeable goods were shipped to stores for sale.
meanings.sent3: The makeable products flew off the shelves due to their popularity.
meanings.sent4: His makeable ideas revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent5: The makeable materials were transformed into beautiful furniture pieces.
